posts.post_content:
Posted By: Craig W
I'm working on a raw all Polar Bear back T206 set and still need most.

Looking for cards in F-VG condition.  Some creasing, corner/edge wear, scuffing, minor paper loss ok.  Trying to avoid cards that are torn, trimmed, have writing or stamping, or are real beaters.

Please email to:  craig_w67217@yahoo.com
